data.text: Hotel was very clear. The hotel is in the heart of Barcelona, near Plaza Catalunia and La Ramblas. The bath was large and very beautifull. We would be stay in this hotel and another time. The hop on - hop off bus (red bus) is almost outside of hotel
data.title: Angel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you very much for your kind words and for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. We are delighted to hear that your stay was enjoyable and that our facilities met your expectations.

It is truly an honor for us to receive such positive feedback regarding the cleanliness of the hotel, its prime location in the heart of Barcelona, close to iconic landmarks such as Plaza Catalunya and La Ramblas, as well as the comfort and beauty of our rooms, especially the bathroom.

We are glad to learn that your experience with the hop-on-hop-off tourist bus service was satisfactory and that our location facilitated your access to this service.

We sincerely hope to welcome you back again in the near future.

Thank you once again for choosing our hotel and for sharing your kind words.

Best regards,
owner_response.author: Direccion Plaza Cataluna

data.text:
Stayed 3 nights for Barcelona Half Marathon. Even though the staff was nice the main problem with the hotels was consistency in service. 

Due to the lack of communication between the staff between day and night pass, and the fact that no one informed me, i was forced to go down to the reception the last night to clear out a payment error for the extended night. 

My booking was made early in November but due to a change in my flight schedule I extended my visit with one night. This was done in late november, and was confirmed both by the hotels own booking system and by the reception. 

Whe I checked in they failed to inform me that the extended night needed to be paid separately when I asked to pay for the stay at the check-in. Sub-par customer care.

Otherwise:
+ Good location
+ Nice staff in general

- Minibar not restocked
- Cleaning missed several items
- The executive Terrace room was really small, and not worth the extra cost
data.title: Sub-par communication

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for providing feedback on your recent stay at our hotel during the Barcelona Half Marathon. We sincerely apologize for the inconsistency in service and the lack of communication that you experienced during your visit.

It is disappointing to hear that there was a breakdown in communication regarding the extension of your stay and the payment process for the additional night. We regret any inconvenience this may have caused you, and we will address this issue with our staff to ensure that similar situations do not occur in the future. Your satisfaction is of utmost importance to us, and we apologize for falling short of your expectations in this regard.

We appreciate your positive comments regarding our hotel's location and the general friendliness of our staff. However, we take your constructive feedback regarding the minibar restocking, cleaning standards, and the size of the executive Terrace room seriously. Rest assured, we will review these areas and take appropriate measures to improve the quality of our services.

Once again, we apologize for the shortcomings you experienced during your stay. We hope that you will consider giving us another opportunity to provide you with the exceptional service and experience that you deserve. 

Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Direccion Plaza Cataluna

data.text: This is an excellent positioned hotel at the end of the Ramblas, with kind and friendly staff with everything you could need. Spa is a bonus. Food lovely. View fantastic and in the summer the pool would be great. Nothing you wouldn't like.
data.title: Wonderful place to stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you very much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our team takes great pride in providing exceptional service and ensuring that our guests have everything they need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.
We're delighted that you found our spa facilities to be a bonus and that you enjoyed the delicious food and fantastic views. We hope to welcome you back soon, perhaps during the summer when you can also enjoy our pool!
Warm regards,
owner_response.author: Direccion Plaza Cataluna

data.text:
Stayed here for 2 nights and I did appreciated the central location and the fact you can reach any place very easily by foot or taxi.
My little terrace overlooking the pool was also a good touch.

But the price paid for this hotel (more than 220 Euros a night) is not worth the bucks. Room is rather small,  lighting is okay, no real desk to work on if you need one.

Bathroom was large but many issues with water in the sink, not draining properly. Also no kleenex tissue box provided which isn’t normal for a 4* hotel.
The room wasn’t really clean upon arrival as well.

Housekeeping staff loud in the morning in the hallways.

Breakfast room was huge with large round table (for what?). Food choice was okay. Staff was unfriendly and looked bored.
Front desk staff was nice but a bit slow for checking me in.
Overall an average stay and I got better value in other hotel brands in central Barcelona.
Will not comeback.
data.title: Not worth the money

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Client,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We appreciate your detailed comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.

We're pleased to hear that you enjoyed the central location and the convenience of reaching various places easily. It's also great to know that you liked the touch of having a terrace overlooking the pool.

However, we sincerely apologize for the shortcomings you experienced during your stay. We take your concerns seriously, and your feedback will be shared with our team to address the areas that require improvement.

We regret any inconvenience caused by the size of the room, lighting, and the absence of a proper work desk. Additionally, we apologize for the issues with the bathroom facilities and any lapses in cleanliness upon your arrival. Rest assured that we will look into these matters promptly.

Your comments regarding the breakfast room, food choice, and staff demeanor have been duly noted. We apologize for any unfriendliness you perceived and any delays during the check-in process. We will work towards ensuring a more efficient and welcoming experience for our guests.

Please be assured that your feedback is valuable to us, and we will use it as an opportunity to make necessary improvements. We understand your concerns, and we regret that we did not meet your expectations during your stay.

We appreciate your honesty and hope you would consider giving us another chance in the future.

Thank you again for choosing Catalonia Plaça Catalunya, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Best regards,
owner_response.author: Direccion Plaza Cataluna

data.text:
Great location.
Decent hotel with uncomplicated process of booking helpful staff.
We didn't get the breakfast option though.
Some amenities have seen better days though as some parts of the room had a distinguished odur.
Quite Room given the centrality of the hotel which contributed to good quality sleep. Mattresses are ok.
data.title: Central Hitel with good value for money

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us.

We're pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be centrally located with good value for money. Our team is delighted that you found the booking process uncomplicated and appreciated the helpfulness of our staff.

We apologize for any inconvenience regarding the breakfast option and the condition of some amenities in your room. Your feedback is important, and we'll address these concerns to ensure a better experience for our guests in the future.

It's great to know that despite the central location, you enjoyed a quiet room that contributed to a good quality sleep. We appreciate your comments on the mattresses as well.

We value your patronage and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for an improved experience.

Thank you for choosing our hotel.

Best regards,
owner_response.author: Direccion Plaza Cataluna
